creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs George Haldeman
description: cliff with small, open walled structure; small fishing boat floating past cliff at center; large rock formation and silhouettes of mountains in background; short inscription URQ
markings: Japanese inscription top L when rolled; top R when rolled, in pen: [Unshitsu]; egg shaped relief seal URC
medium: Ink and light colors on silk
title: Lake Landscape
